name: Darren Owens
text: I usually only eat lunch buffet. The service and food are much better than it use to be. Nicer staff.  They do a good job of keeping the buffet stocked. They will prepare special requests for the buffet that come out fairly quickly. The …More

text: Polite and fast.. the manager Kris Jones was awesome,the cook washed his hands before prep! Good job tonight to the entire crew. U guys are awesome

text: Pizza and pasta was good. Salad bar was missing a lot of items and we asked if they could refill it and they said they was out of the items. I won't be going back for a long time.

text: Used to be the best place for a fresh salad but the last few times we have gone some of the items on the salad bar were mushy or slimy. Some things looked like they had been kept in the cooler too long or had frozen and thawed. …More
